title: DBS will anchor PCBL's Rs 700-crore issue to finance Aquapharm buy
description: Stock exchange-listed PCBL Ltd announced the acquisition of Aquapharm Chemicals Pvt Ltd last November for Rs 3,800 crore. It informed the exchanges that the acquisition would be done through a wholly owned subsidiary company, Advaya Chemicals Industries Ltd, which was incorporated on January 11.
